title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2818.1 - Reapplication submission requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2818.1 - Reapplication submission requirements

State Regulations
(a) The applicant must complete such forms
and attachments as are prescribed by the division. (b) Essential components of the application
include: (1)
recertification of applicant and
region eligibility; (2)
completion
of current contractual obligations, including quantified, measurable
accomplishments as required; (3)
evidence that such accomplishments have had a significant impact on the
region; (4)
quantified, measurable
objectives to be accomplished by the completion of the activities proposed in
the work plan; (5)
proposed RPP
budget; (6)
evidence of the
required one-third match; (7)
evidence of progress toward securing funds from other sources for
administrative and planning costs; (8)
compliance with fiscal and administrative
requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2818.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
